backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor types for books, meditation data, journal entries, user profiles, and rituals, and initializes a static list of book recommendations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for build planning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of many frontend source files describing their purpose and recent changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook outlining prerequisites and step-by-step commands for redeploying the frontend and backend.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template-based guide for diagnosing deployment failures across build and deploy stages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template initializing global error handlers and loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in theme and error boundary providers.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel UI for selecting ambient sounds with audio preview, swipe gestures, and volume/mute controls.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a detailed fallback UI with error info and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Displays an error banner for cloud sync issues with context‑aware messages and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: A slider-based input for selecting a duration in minutes with configurable bounds.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating sidebar navigation with animated icons that route to different app sections.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide‑out menu providing theme toggle, authentication controls, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Popover UI allowing filtering journal entries by favorites, mood, energy, dates, and text.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Swipeable paginated viewer for knowledge pages with keyboard, touch, and animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel for knowledge categories with swipe, keyboard, and circular navigation, showing center, adjacent, and hidden items with dynamic transforms.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, supports navigation, and computes results before calling onComplete.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, stem, and center glow based on a growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Particle system around the lotus that animates chaotic or coherent motion depending on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based animated lotus with particles, glow, and theme-dependent visibility, updating on resize and running a continuous render loop.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Meditation selector carousel with swipe and circular navigation, rendering centered, adjacent, and hidden cards.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Stepper for meditation steps with swipe navigation, dot controls, and parsing of content into main text and benefits.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular timer ring with animated wave progress and theme-aware colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas component showing a circular filling animation with dynamic waves based on progress and theme.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard and supports a custom back handler.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Wrapper that renders a full-page background using LotusCanvas behind page content.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered bowl visualization that fills and animates based on total meditation minutes and theme.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: Three.js canvas rendering a 3D lotus model and particles whose growth depends on total meditation minutes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus that animates growth, breathing, and glow effects based on total minutes, streak, and theme.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Modal quiz flow with five questions that computes and returns a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal that displays a carousel of saved rituals and lets the user select or delete a ritual.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel UI for browsing, selecting, and deleting saved rituals with confirmation handling and animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Shows login/guest status and provides logout or return-to-start actions, clearing cached queries on logout.
Navigation bar with session indicator, theme toggle, back button, and mobile menu integration.
frontend/src/components/ThemedToaster.ts: Wrapper component rendering a themed toast notification container.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Hook providing a retry-enabled cloud write operation using the current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storing identity state, and exposing login status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a customizable countdown meditation timer with pause, reset, progress tracking, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as books, quotes, user profiles, and journal entries with guest-mode fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind styles, theme variables, custom animations, and typography for the app.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation-related books with descriptions and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Contains structured educational content and quizzes for various meditation techniques.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
Empty or placeholder file for the Active Meditation page component.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays book recommendations with swipe and button navigation, handling dynamic positioning of cards and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard for selecting meditation types, launching sessions, managing rituals, and accessing quiz-based recommendations.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Provides journal entry management with filtering, editing, favoriting, importing/exporting, and cloud‑sync handling.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Shows meditation knowledge content with category navigation, deep‑link scrolling, and quiz score persistence per user.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen handling login, guest mode, theme switching, and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Page handling pre-meditation setup including mood/energy selection, duration, ambient sound, and starting sessions with detailed guide steps.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user progress stats and handles exporting/importing data with cloud sync error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for reflection content.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for stats content.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound metadata and utilities to retrieve sound info and paths by ID.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Classifies cloud sync errors, provides user-friendly messages, and includes readiness polling logic.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Implements retry logic for cloud operations with readiness and authorization checks.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization, validation, and normalization for exporting and importing meditation-related data.
Manages saving and retrieving quiz scores in localStorage with identity-based scoping.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Defines a lotus growth model mapping total meditation minutes to multi-layer visual bloom parameters and particle effects.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Implements guest-only localStorage handling for journal entries, progress data, and rituals including legacy data migration.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes meditation type strings, mapping aliases like 'meta' to supported MeditationType values.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers based on total meditation minutes and provides helpers to get current, next, and displayable ranks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash fragments, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, shadows, and container settings with custom design tokens and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, existing features, and pending requests related to ritual tag icons and quiz-based meditation routing.
